name: Jumpstart Pro
description: A Ruby on Rails template for SaaS apps and more

RAILS_MASTER_KEY.description: Secret key for decrypting Rails credentials. You can find it at: config/credentials/production.key

RAILS_ENV.description: The Rails environment to run: production or staging

ALLOW_SIGN_UP.description: Whether or not to show the link for creating a new account

CAN_RESET_DATA.description: Enable or disable the link to wipe the db and create the fixture (30 Rock) data
